title: Guilford Courthouse National Military Park: Materials For Loan
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Materials For Loan              Materials For Loan          For classroom use or for pre-trip preparation, the park has loan copies of "Guilford Letters", an 18-minute VHS video on the campaign of Guilford Courthouse, and the 30-minute film "Another Such Victory". Videotape(s) and DVD(s) may be picked up at the park visitor center or may be sent by mail to your school. Teachers are responsible for the return of these items to the park.
